title: Sidewall, 1821–28
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Floral bouquets, with foliate swags and scrolls, printed in white on blue ground. A lacey white stripe runs vertically through the center of the paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, 1821–28.
1821–28. Block-printed on handmade paper. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-105.
